# WatchKitErrorDomain

**Global Variable**

The domain for WatchKit errors.

## Declaration

```swift
let WatchKitErrorDomain: String
```

## Discussion

The system uses this value in the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSError] class.
